trans-unit.source: Defines the optional contract that a binding can implement to specify whether incoming requests are handled synchronously or asynchronously by the service.
trans-unit.target: 들어오는 요청이 동기적 또는 비동기적으로 서비스에 의해 처리 여부를 지정 하기 위해 바인딩을 구현할 수 있는 선택적 계약을 정의 합니다.

trans-unit.source: In some cases it may be more efficient for a binding to process messages with the synchronous <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.Receive%2A> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.Request%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 일부 경우에는 것 보다 효율적으로 동기 메시지 처리에 대 한 바인딩을 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.Receive%2A>또는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.Request%2A>메서드.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.Request%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.Receive%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding> class can optionally implement IBindingRuntimePreferences to indicate to callers that this is preferred.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding>IBindingRuntimePreferences 기본 설정 임을 호출자에 게 나타내기 위해 선택적으로 구현할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding>

trans-unit.source: If a binding does not implement IBindingRuntimePreferences, the [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] Service Model Runtime layer defaults to using the asynchronous versions of the `Receive` and `Request` methods.
trans-unit.target: 바인딩을 IBindingRuntimePreferences를 구현 하지 않는 경우는 [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] 서비스 모델 런타임 계층에서 비동기 버전을 사용 하 여 기본적으로 `Receive` 및 `Request` 메서드.

trans-unit.source: If a binding does implement IBindingRuntimePreferences, the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] Service Model Runtime layer checks the value of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A> and uses that to determine whether to call the synchronous versions of the these methods (<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.Receive%2A> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.Request%2A>) or the asynchronous versions (<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.BeginReceive%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.EndReceive%28System.IAsyncResult%29> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.BeginRequest%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.EndRequest%28System.IAsyncResult%29>.
trans-unit.target: 바인딩을 IBindingRuntimePreferences, 구현 않는 경우에 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] 의 값을 확인 하는 서비스 모델 런타임 계층 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A>이 사용 하 여 이러한 동기 버전을 호출 여부를 결정 하 고 메서드 (<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.Receive%2A> 또는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.Request%2A>) 또는 비동기 버전 (<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.BeginReceive%2A> <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.EndReceive%28System.IAsyncResult%29> <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.BeginRequest%2A>및 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.EndRequest%28System.IAsyncResult%29>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.EndRequest%28System.IAsyncResult%29> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.BeginRequest%2A> 또는</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.EndReceive%28System.IAsyncResult%29> 및</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.BeginReceive%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.Request%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.Receive%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A>

trans-unit.source: If IBindingRuntimePreferences is implemented by the binding and returns `true` from the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A> property, it is recommended that you use the synchronous <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.Receive%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.Request%2A> methods to receive messages from the channel.
trans-unit.target: IBindingRuntimePreferences 바인딩에 의해 구현 되 고 반환 하는 경우 `true` 에서 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A>속성을 것이 좋습니다를 사용 하는 동기 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.Receive%2A>및 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.Request%2A>채널에서 메시지를 수신 하는 메서드.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.Request%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.Receive%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the binding does not implement IBindingRuntimePreferences or returns `false` from the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A> property, it is recommended that you use the asynchronous <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.BeginReceive%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.EndReceive%28System.IAsyncResult%29> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.BeginRequest%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.EndRequest%28System.IAsyncResult%29> methods.
trans-unit.target: IBindingRuntimePreferences 또는 반환 바인딩이 구현 하지 않는 경우 `false` 에서 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A>속성을 것이 좋습니다를 사용 하는 비동기 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.BeginReceive%2A>및 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.EndReceive%28System.IAsyncResult%29>또는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.BeginRequest%2A>및 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.EndRequest%28System.IAsyncResult%29>메서드.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.EndRequest%28System.IAsyncResult%29> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.BeginRequest%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.EndReceive%28System.IAsyncResult%29> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.BeginReceive%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A>

trans-unit.source: Regardless of the value returned by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A> property, all bindings must still provide valid implementations of both the synchronous and asynchronous versions of the `Receive` methods for the specific channel types implemented.
trans-unit.target: 반환 된 값에 관계 없이 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A>속성을 모든 바인딩 구현을 제공 해야 유효한 동기 및 비동기 버전의 `Receive` 구현 된 특정 채널 형식에 대 한 메서드.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about implementing custom channels, see [Developing Channels](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 사용자 지정 채널 구현 하는 방법에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조 [개발 채널](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether incoming requests can be handled more efficiently synchronously or asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: 더 효율적으로 동기적 또는 비동기적으로 들어오는 요청을 처리할 수 있는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The standard (system-provided) bindings provided by [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] have implemented this interface and in some cases override the default value to process incoming messages synchronously.
trans-unit.target: 제공 하는 표준 (시스템 제공) 바인딩 [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] 이 인터페이스를 구현 하며 경우에 따라 들어오는 메시지를 동기적으로 처리 하도록 기본값을 재정의 합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if requests can be handled more efficiently synchronously; otherwise<xref uid="langword_csharp_ false" name=" false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>요청을 동기적으로 보다 효율적으로; 처리할 수 있습니다 하는 경우 그렇지 않으면<xref uid="langword_csharp_ false" name=" false" href=""></xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, to handle requests asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>로, 요청을 비동기적으로 처리 합니다.
